alert.note: Alert for Teller (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 4:53PM MDT until July 07 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Teller County in central Colorado... * Until 530 PM MDT. * At 453 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Florissant, or 24 miles west of Colorado Springs, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Teller County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
